SEQUENCE.NARRATION: In the middle of an uncharacteristically silent dinner, the center stage lights up and projects a larger than life hologram of Grandmaster Hartin, who has a somber expression on his face.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Cadets – I regret to inform you that the Rogue Grandmaster has begun his assault on some of our reconnaissance vehicles.
As such, we will need to hasten our attack on the Deathcube.
As [TA name] has taught many of you in his Object Simulation class, we will need to design simulations of the interior of that ship in order to carry out a successful mission.
We want to harness the power of having a large amount of Cadets – and very intelligent ones, I may add – to find the best possible course of action in this scenario.
Whoever comes up with the best working assault pattern, will have their design used during our real assault.
This is serious, Cadets. We need all the help you can provide.
Sounds like they're putting a lot of faith in us.
Come on! Let's quickly head to the classroom after this to start working on the problem.
Who knows, they might even choose one of ours!
Then we should put in our best effort!

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: The two of you swiftly finish your meal and hurry down to the classrooms, already thinking of what you might put in your simulations...
